title: Atlanten Stadion
text:
Atlanten Stadion is a multi-use <a href="stadium">stadium</a> in <a href="Kristiansund">Kristiansund</a>, <a href="Norway">Norway</a>. It is currently used mostly for <a href="Association%20football">football</a> matches and <a href="track-and-field">track-and-field</a> competitions, and is the former home ground of <a href="Eliteserien">Eliteserien</a> team <a href="Kristiansund%20BK">Kristiansund BK</a>. Kristiansund BK played at Atlanten Stadion until 2007, when they moved to Omsundet, <a href="Frei">Frei</a>. Atlanten Stadion has a rubber track for <a href="track%20and%20field">track and field</a> meets, but this has fallen into deterioration.
Renovation.
As of 2019, Atlanten Stadion is being renovated completely.
